extendedInfo.description: by Glenn Corpes** PLEASE NOTE STEREO 3D IS AN OPTIONAL FEATURE - YOU DO NOT NEED 3D GLASSES TO PLAY **** XHD / THD Version - Gingerbread (2.3+), Tegra 2 and Xperia PLAY optimized with Stereoscopic 3D Support (with 3D glasses on all devices and glasses free on the HTC Evo 3D devices). If you have a LG Optimus 3D or Sharp 3D device, please try the HD version. **Stunning visuals and a pumping sound track make this ground-breaking game the way perfect way to show off what your phone can do! Nominated last year for a Best App Ever Award on iPhone and was featured multiple times on the App Store under both New and Noteworthy and What's Hot, this is fast-paced, arcade style ekranoplan racing action at it's very best. Boasting incredible 3D graphic detail and procedural landscapes never before seen in any game of its type, the game will appeal to lovers of fast-paced, competitive action genres as well as those who prefer something more sedate and relaxing. 14 challenging levels await you with big jumps, steep drops and twisting paths to master all playable in Stereoscopic 3D if you have 3D glasses to hand. Hunt down your opponents one by one in an attempt to take a medal and unlock the next track or challenge your previous best time in a head to head ghost race. Choose to follow one of the pre-prescribed routes and accumulate boosts by successfully steering through check points, or simply ignore the markers/towers and guidance and choose to explore the road less travelled. Whichever you choose, you're guaranteed a beautiful journey!Features include:* 14 challenging levels* 10 different Ground Effect craft* Stunning terrains (both land and sea)* Free roaming â explore at will* Impressive draw distance * Sensitive and intuitive flight controls * Throttle speed controller* High score recording* Replay & ghost-race modes* Boost control* Day and night scenarios * Driver/1st person camera view* Stereo 3D option, glasses free for HTC Evo 3D* Free-play practice levels* Super smooth animation up to 60FPS* App2sd supportedPlease note optional Stereoscopic 3D mode requires 3D glasses of the red/cyan, yellow/blue or green/magenta (best) variety. You don't need 3D glasses to play.Please email us with questions or feedback.

reviews.title: Battery hungry greatness
reviews.comment: Great gameplay meets bye bye battery! What a fantastic way to use up all your power, shame really. Enjoy!
reviews.author: Richard Martin

reviews.title: Wonder
reviews.comment: wow nice 3d , little improve need in 3d & more clear need in full hd , I like this game , great app
reviews.author: RAVI KIRAN

reviews.title: -shrug-
reviews.comment: It is ok not my favorite or even 2nd. I like the cruise around and enjoy the view mode but not too keen on the control or difficulty.
reviews.author: Michael Johnson

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: I hope this game continues to be improved.
reviews.author: jason crighton

reviews.title: An ok casual title.
reviews.comment: Handling is much more difficult when viewing the craft from the third person perspective. Switch to first person for the best control of the aircraft. The graphics and game menu tend to be a visual eyesore. Overall a good game to play when you are bored and have nothing else to do...you might get bored playing it after a while though. Will provide you with at most half an hour of solid gameplay.
reviews.author: Orlando De La Paz

reviews.title: No race..
reviews.comment: This is no race... It\'s a pursuit. Races are when everyone starts on the starting line together. Wish it were more racing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sony play map please .
reviews.comment: It\'s so much better having the PlayStation controls with these sorts of games fantastic game but please can u put a map in hard 2 no where ur going.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ground efect pro
reviews.comment: The best game on android. Its so good sometimes I forget the time. And when I look it can be an hour or more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hover Racer!
reviews.comment: Finally a new take on hover racing. As intense or relaxed as you like. Great flying/gliding sensation. Love it. 3D effect cool too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
reviews.comment: Runs and looks great on my Evo3D. The control feels like it should for racing these types of vehicles. And now 5 stars, as promised, for the glasses free 3D support. Thanks Jakyl!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ye, that\'s it
reviews.comment: Awesome, just for flying around on my P6800. Really amazing game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Enjoyable.
reviews.comment: But craft shouldn\'t automatically speed up when brake is released. Could use a few more obstacles/hazards & power-ups or rewards. Runs smoothly on the galaxy tab 10.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Cool in 3D to. Not the deepest effect but one part of the game the tail is popping out of the tablet screen. I was using yellow and blue glasses. Colors are more accurate that way. Anyways the gameplay is fun and luckily you can use touch screen controlls. I enjoyedthis game a lot!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If you have an EVO 3d, purchase this game.  It works flawlessly, and has an awesome soundtrack.  fluid and seamless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Evo 3D issues
reviews.comment: Just played a soon to be released updated version for the Evo V 3D which is awesome in 3D.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome!
reviews.comment: I loved it on the ipod touch. I love it more on my eee pad Transformer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this game but need some tech support.
reviews.comment: I had this game in my  palm pre and was hoping I\'d find this one day on the droid.  I am having problems on my lg optimus.  Crashes after few  races
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dull graphics and gameplay
reviews.comment: This is just out classed by other droid racing games these days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad!
reviews.comment: Reminds me of wave racer when the n64 came out. Wish crashing wasn\'t so frequent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Malware apps
reviews.comment: Rubbish Do not buy. apps running background when not in use. Scam and fraud
reviews.author: A Google User
